body: that last page is amazingly beautiful ngl
She fucked that guy who was in trial.

I don't know about that badoelol. Oda Non's works feels too manufactured, monotone or lifelike. Clone Ningen has intensity, is dynamic, and hyperbolic without going off the rails. Oda Non just doesn't do it for me.
And she returns to the streets from whence she came. Meh... She's just a hungry cum dumpster. Art is okay but calling this NTR is a bit of a stretch in my opinion.
clone ningen art style feels like.. it really trying so hard to be the best as Oda Non, I can see it clearly...

Deadfish , yeah, most of NTR plots are twisted ,most of the plot reasons are also kinda shits , you know gold ,really hard to find out one. It's dirty to say but you guys must admit it. In case having sex in indoor place like store room where it's quiet ,just crossing a shelf means nothing , you know sexual sounds always came out when having sex . The plot is already dead at that time. So they would always be imagination plots and that also limits them from next level golds. But you've to say the drawings is pretty good except plot . The title is don't find reasoning in NTR .  XD
Metroid nah no one knows, from page 12 its just her imagination. She want to be screwed by them. Then there is dude from 2nd chapter which she fuck earlier.
BZo1480 yeah thats the ending. You can see at first few page they fuck in office desk, and woman put paper from floor, this is exact scene after they leave the door open.
As always the art is 10/10 with Ningen, loved all his past works too! Cant wait to read it in English!

Honestly, i dont get the story. What the hell she actually want? At first she just wanna fuck cause it feels good. Then why it become this complicated? This, is epilogue. So i will never know, meh. Same like another story about teacher that blackmailed by principal son's just for 'fun'. The ending is shit, he also embarassed himself in the end by fucking in public. What the hell author want from his character. I know this is hentai, but bruh if u just make half assed story better just make 1 chapter full of fucking without context.
IIRC, there's another part where at the end she and the main guy here get seen fucking in her office, leaving it open for something in the future if Clone wants to come back to it.
The art style is new, clean and the plot is as good as a NTR plot could be.

This was some good ntr but dam the husband paying bills and a house and she fucking everything under the sun, that guy turned her out and all she be thinking of is getting gangbanged lmao i wonder if he ok with that in the long run
As always.. superb art and story.
